Title: EVERY OFFSEASON MOVE SO FAR FOR ALL 30 TEAMS
Description: Keep track of every free agency deal from the 2023 NBA offseason.

Title: CLARKSON, JAZZ REPORTEDLY AGREE TO 3-YEAR EXTENSION
Description: The Jazz guard averaged 20.8 points last season and won Kia Sixth Man of the Year in 2020-21.

Title: DIVINCENZO REPORTEDLY REACHES DEAL WITH KNICKS
Description: The swingman is reportedly headed to the Knicks, where he will join 2 of his former Villanova teammates.

Title: REPORTS: SABONIS, KINGS AGREE ON EXTENSION
Description: Kings center Domantas Sabonis reportedly renegotiates his deal into existing cap space, adding 4 years and $195 in new money.

Title: REPORTS: BROOKS, ROCKETS REACH 4-YEAR DEAL
Description: Dillon Brooks is reportedly moving on from Memphis after spending his first 6 seasons with the team.

Title: REPORTS: WESTBROOK RE-SIGNING WITH CLIPPERS
Description: After his successful run with the Clippers to end the 2nd half of the season, the veteran point guard is rewarded with a 2-year, $8 million deal.

Title: REPORT: KNICKS TRADING TOPPIN TO PACERS
Description: New York reportedly sends its No. 8 pick from the 2020 Draft to Indiana in exchange for two future 2nd-round picks.

Title: REPORTS: LAMELO FINALIZING 5-YEAR EXTENSION
Description: Guard LaMelo Ball is set to receive a reported 5-year, $260 million extension from the Hornets.

Title: REPORTS: REAVES, LAKERS AGREE TO $56M DEAL
Description: Swingman Austin Reaves and the Lakers have reportedly agreed to a 4-year deal.

Title: REPORTS: LOPEZ, BUCKS AGREE TO 2-YEAR DEAL
Description: Veteran center Brook Lopez agrees to a reported 2-year, $48 million deal to stay in Milwaukee.

Title: REPORT: LAKERS KEEP RUSSELL WITH 2-YEAR DEAL
Description: D'Angelo Russell appeared in 17 games for the Lakers last season and was a solid contributor during their West Finals run.

Title: LILLARD ASKS BLAZERS FOR TRADE, TEAM CONFIRMS
Description: Damian Lillard is calling his shot. Portland's all-time leading scorer is ready to leave the only team he's ever played for.

Title: REPORTS: CAVS LAND STRUS IN SIGN-AND-TRADE
Description: The Spurs, Cavs and Heat are a part of a reported deal in which Max Strus goes to Cleveland and Cedi Osman and Lamar Stevens go to San Antonio.

Title: REPORTS: PISTONS GET MORRIS IN TRADE WITH WIZARDS
Description: Veteran guard and Michigan native Monte Morris is reportedly dealt from the Wizards to the Pistons.

Title: REPORTS: HEAT DEAL OLADIPO BACK TO THUNDER
Description: Oklahoma City re-acquires former All-Star Victor Oladipo from Miami for future Draft compensation.

Title: NBA PLAYERS REACT TO 1ST DAYS OF FREE AGENCY
Description: The NBA free agency period started with a bang, and many players took to Twitter to applaud their teammates and friends.

Title: BANE REPORTEDLY AGREES TO 5-YEAR EXTENSION
Description: The 30th pick of the 2020 Draft reportedly cements his status as a long-term cornerstone for the Grizzlies.

Title: REPORT: HALIBURTON AGREES TO MAX EXTENSION
Description: Haliburton became the 15th player in NBA history to average 20 points and 10 assists in a season.

Title: REPORTS: ROCKETS GIVE VANVLEET 3-YEAR DEAL
Description: The 29-year-old VanVleet brings production & experience to a Rockets team that hasn't had a winning season since 2019-20.

Title: REPORTS: JOHNSON TO RE-SIGN WITH NETS
Description: Johnson averaged 16.6 points over 25 games for Brooklyn during the 2022-23 season.

Title: REPORTS: VINCENT TO SIGN 3-YEAR DEAL WITH LAKERS
Description: Vincent came up huge during Miami's 2023 run to the NBA Finals as he averaged 12.6 points per game in the playoffs.

Title: REPORTS: RAPTORS RETAIN POELTL FOR $80 MILLION
Description: Poeltl will remain in Toronto after averaging 13.1 points and 9.1 rebounds following his arrival at the 2023 trade deadline.

Title: REPORT: PORZINGIS, CELTICS AGREE TO EXTENSION
Description: Porzingis is coming off his best NBA season, averaging a career-high 23.2 points per game.

Title: REPORT: MIDDLETON TO RE-SIGN WITH BUCKS
Description: The All-Star forward averaged 15.1 points, 4.9 assists and 4.2 rebounds for Milwaukee in 2022-23.
